recipe_overview.description: Deploys the AnythingLLM stack using Docker. This provides an all-in-one private RAG solution and can be used as an alternative front-end to Open WebUI.
deliverables: A Docker Compose file for the full AnythingLLM stack.
A private RAG environment accessible to the user.

tasks.title: Deploy AnythingLLM Stack
tasks.description: Create and configure a docker-compose.yml file to run the AnythingLLM image. This service is optional and must be enabled by the user in the configuration.
acceptance_criteria: The anything-llm.yml Docker Compose file is created.
The container can be started if enabled in the configuration.
The AnythingLLM web interface is accessible on its port when running.
